page.title: 10Davenham Village Policeman
page.content: Our village policeman keeps law and order in our village. He starts his round at 8.00am and finishes at 2.00am the next morning. His duties vary every day. He may be on patrol one day and have to do paperwork the next day. The area he covers is from the bottom of London Road in Northwich, Leftwich and Davenham. On patrol he goes around in uniform and the only equipment he carries are a truncheon, handcuffs and a walkie-talkie. The most common crimes are shoplifting, damages and breaking into people's homes. In the area he covers he arrests more teenagers than adults. He mainly arrests them for drunkenness, shoplifting and minor damages. He has been to a few real emergencies such as old people collapsing, house-fires, road accidents. The good thing he sees in the village is tidiness.
